author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Bazaarvoice Says CFO James Offerdahl Will Step Down From His Position Upon Closing Of Merger​ ‍
text:
Jan 11 (Reuters) - Bazaarvoice Inc:
* BAZAARVOICE SAYS CFO JAMES OFFERDAHL WILL STEP DOWN FROM HIS POSITION UPON CLOSING OF MERGER​ - SEC FILING ‍ Source text ( bit.ly/2D60ocM ) Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
